info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:58PM CDT until June 02 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHACKELFORD COUNTY... At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albany, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Ibex around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
